q: The next step is to reduce U.S. unemployment, an issue Barack Obama should make`` the centerpiece'' of his annual State of the Union address on Jan. 25, the former Cabinet member said. The American people are expecting him to say something about what he's going to do to keep the economy moving forward, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell has criticized his own party in recent months while supporting Barack Obama 's ultimately successful fight for Senate ratification of a new nuclear-arms-reduction treaty with Russia. Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible. Michael Vick was once the NFL's highest-paid player and he endorsed many products during his six seasons with the Atlanta Falcons. Allen Iverson 's still hurting Former All-Star Allen Iverson , 35, could miss the rest of the regular season and the playoffs with Turkish team Besiktas because of painful calcium deposits in his calf. He tried to tough it out and continue to play while over in Turkey, said Dr. James Andrews, who added Allen Iverson needs at least 6-8 weeks of rest.`` However, he got to the point where he could not really run up and down the court.'' judge and new CNN talkshow host told Metro that he was shocked by the powerful position to which the the Liberal Democrat leader has since risen. Asked who were his most difficult interviewees, Piers Morgan said: Ones who emerge as fairly imbecilic. Nick Clegg stands out; my GQ interview with him was a series of spectacular own goals.`` I thought,' I hope he never ends up running the country' and, whoa- here he is. How can this guy be so powerful? It's frightening. He added:`` Simon Cowell was tough because we're friends but he was also my boss and he wouldn't be afraid to use that advantage- but it made for good TV.'' EastEnders:

While Google resisted threats from rivals Yahoo! and Microsoft under Eric Schmidt , Page will confront fiercer rivals, said Whit Andrews, an analyst at Gartner. Google versus Facebook is an order of magnitude more challenging, said Andrews. Competing with the social network for the attention of Web users will require new technology that differs from search, he said. Google co-founder Sergey Brin , 37, will focus on strategic projects,
